text:
The UK royal family announced that HRH Prince Philip passed away this morning. As someone who just passed the UK citizenship test, I'm probably obliged to fly the flag at half staff now. Ninety-nine... as my grandfather would have said, "not a bad innings".

|
|
|
|:flag-gb:
|
|
|

attachments.title: Prince Philip Movement
attachments.text: The Prince Philip Movement is a religious sect followed by the Kastom people around Yaohnanen village on the southern island of Tanna in Vanuatu. It is a cargo cult of the Yaohnanen tribe, who believed that the late Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, the consort to Queen Elizabeth II, is a divine being.

text: that's such a wonderfully bizarre story, I love it.  The lack of details on the wiki page make me a bit suspicious of it though

text: If he had made it one more year, he could have applied for the Queen to write him a letter of congratulations <https://www.gov.uk/get-birthday-anniversary-message-from-queen|https://www.gov.uk/get-birthday-anniversary-message-from-queen>
